title: The Last Laser Show
description: Things haven’t turned out the way Arthur Deadman believed they would. Orson Welles had directed Citizen Kane by the time he’d hit 25 … the only thing Arthur had made by 25 was a regular ass of himself, now he was 38, and that remained the high watermark of his achievements. Yet Arthur has one last roll of the dice. One last trip to the great city of show, to sell a story that’s his ticket to the big time … the only problem for Arthur, is how much selling his story will cost him.Brimming with unforgettable laugh-out-loud moments, The Last Laser Show is the unique, hilarious and touching tale, of Arthur Deadman’s bittersweet journey to make it in the business of show. As he stumbles beyond the velvet curtain, hoping to finally find the right buyer for his story.
author: Ian Avery
